pullrequest.title: Enable urdf2gazebo to parse multiple collision/visual elements per link

content.raw:
I've overhauled the code style and update this pull request:

  - all functions are capitalized with _prefixed params, and doxygen documents.
  - all member variables are lower case camel cased.
content.html:
I've overhauled the code style and update this pull request:

  • all functions are capitalized with _prefixed params, and doxygen documents.
  • all member variables are lower case camel cased.
